name: BullFish
description:
A small fish in a large market! The STOCK MARKET!

Press W and S to go up and down a green space, and use the mouse to aim and launch yourself! Bigger jumps get more points! Go for broke!

Press M to MUTE.

Made as a triple dipper challenge, three jams at once! 

Game Maker's Toolkit 2020

MiniJam 58

Weekly Game Jam 157
